title: Chou ka Han ka: Gokudou-sama Afurete Afurete Nakasetai
original_name: 蝶か犯か ～極道様 溢れて溢れて泣かせたい～
sinopse:
The Young mistress Miumi got abducted to the world of the yakuza!? There, she met the young leader Mikogami... Unpredictable!! Excitement at its max!! The too dangerous love is beginning!!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
